title: Create User Authentication
description: Implement user registration, login, and logout functionality. Ensure a seamless and secure user experience.

title: Implement Google Sign-In
description: Integrate Google sign-in for user authentication. Enhance user convenience and authentication options.

title: Design Landing Page
description: Create an attractive landing page for the website. Capture user attention with visually appealing elements and strategically design the layout for a positive and engaging user experience.

title: Create Task Management Dashboard
description: Build the dashboard to display tasks and manage them. Centralize task management for improved productivity and organization.

title: Implement Drag-and-Drop Functionality
description: Enable users to move tasks between 'To-Do', 'Ongoing', and 'Completed'. Streamline task organization and workflow customization.

title: Integrate React Hook Form
description: Use React Hook Form for creating tasks. Leverage the power of React hooks for efficient and dynamic form handling.

title: Implement Task Deletion
description: Allow users to delete tasks from the dashboard. Provide users with the flexibility to manage their task list effortlessly.
